Only download attachments when manually requested View your day, week, or month Check your calendar to find out when you\'re busy or available. On your Android phone, open the Schedule Tuner app. Choose how many days to view when you open the ScheduleTuner app, you\'ll see a list of your upcoming events. You can switch views to see your whole day or multiple days. In the top left corner, tap the Menu Menu. Choose a view, like Schedule or Month. To see all your events, goals, and reminders in a list that\'s broken up by day, choose \"Schedule.\" Change your settings Learn how to change your calendar settings, including the way your calendar looks and the day your week starts on. â™¦
